Vehicle Repair Shop System

Vehicle Repair Shop System

In this project, in teams of 5, we built a website and a mobile Android application for a Vehicle Repair Shop. The Vehicle Repair Shop system will allow customers, technicians and an administrative assistant to manage their accounts, make appointments and etc. Details of the functtionalities and the code repo can be found here.

Tech

  • Frontend: Vue.js
  • Backend: Java, Spring boot

Duration

The project was semester-long which was about 4 months.
